E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 5/6/1973
Subject: Progress of Nino Espinosa
Dear Sir,
Nino Espinosa is doing pretty good at AA Trois-Rivieres Aigles!
He has an ERA of 3.93, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 5/7/1973
Subject: Bobby Marcano learns new position
Bobby Marcano has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Third Base.
I would rate his skills as "B" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Thursday, 5/9/1973
Subject: Status of Bill Melton
Dear Sir,
Bill Melton isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Trois-Rivieres Aigles!
He has an AVG of .185, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Saturday, 5/11/1973
Subject: Progress of Willie Hernandez
Dear Sir,
Willie Hernandez is doing pretty good at A Tampa Tarpons!
He has an ERA of 2.45, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
